career.name: University of Waterloo Formula Electric
career.title: Software Engineer - Dashboard Lead
description: Led the development of an internal dashboard for live telemetry, enabling team members to monitor real-time performance from over 150 data sources, eliminating the need to restart the vehicle to view sensor data

Ensured timely development and deployment of team software by utilizing SDLC and Agile methodologies for effective project management, leading to increased team velocity and a 35% reduction in work-in-progress tasks

Collaborated with over 100 team members by utilizing Atlassian Suite (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket) to manage workflows, coordinate resources, and track project progress across more than 10 cross-functional teams
